about.abttext: Provider of medical equipment in Venezuela, covering the needs of the Venezuelan health sector and helping our clients to connect with their patients and achieve their goals.
about.mision: Cover the needs of the Venezuelan health sector, helping our clients to connect with their patients and achieve their goals, guaranteeing medium and long-term benefits, achieving well-being and improving the comprehensive health of their teams.
about.vision: To be your trusted provider in the supply, maintenance, sale and repair of medical equipment, guaranteeing safety and control of your equipment with solutions that help the well-being of the institution.
about.send: Reaching every corner of Venezuela, at the request of the best clinics nationwide.
about.tech: The best professionals in the field of maintenance and installation of our equipment.
about.distrib: More than 10 medical centers in the country have our support.
about.feedback: We are recognized for our low response time, if you have any questions about our products or services, write to us!

products.prsubtitle: Discover the advantages and benefits of working with us.
products.techservmain: Professionals specialized in technical service for the attention of your equipment, available to you 24 hours a day.
products.equipmentmain: From General Electric to Siemens, our equipment represents the cutting edge of our field and at the best price on the market. Contact us for more information.
products.sparepartsmain: We have a large quantity of all kinds of spare parts for all your imaging equipment.

Testimonies.testsubtitle: Don't just take our word for it, take our customer's too.
Testimonies.1test: — Our business partners @Sundac_e are a sign of trust and support.
Testimonies.2test: — They have competitive prices, human quality and technical support 24 hours a day, always available to us.
Testimonies.3test: — Excellent service providers, who provide immediate care and have trained staff.
